sentences.en: As a group, females performed better on the test than males.
sentences.cn: 整体来说，女性在这次测试中胜过男性。

sentences.en: Each female will lay just one egg in April or May.
sentences.cn: 每个雌体四五月份只产一粒卵。

sentences.en: Female fans fought their way past bodyguards and tore at his clothes.
sentences.cn: 女粉丝冲破保安的阻拦，撕扯他的衣裳。

sentences.en: Figs have male and female flowers.
Hay fever affects males more than females.
sentences.cn: 男性感染花粉热多于女性。

sentences.en: I realize there's no consensus on what are male or female values.
sentences.cn: 我意识到人们对什么是男性价值观和什么是女性价值观并无共识。

sentences.en: It is often very hard to compare all-male and all-female jobs.
sentences.cn: 纯男性工作和纯女性工作之间常常很难作比较。

sentences.en: Norwegian whalers said yesterday they had harpooned a female minke whale.
sentences.cn: 挪威的捕鲸人说昨天他们用捕鲸叉捕获了一头雌性小须鲸。

sentences.en: Oestrogen is a female sex hormone.
sentences.cn: 雌激素是一种雌性荷尔蒙。

sentences.en: Over half of the staff is female.
sentences.cn: 半数以上的员工是女性。

sentences.en: She doffs her garb worn under fire and wears again female attire.
sentences.cn: 脱我战时袍着我旧时裳.

sentences.en: Stowe gives a stirring performance as a strong spirited female.
sentences.cn: 斯托扮演了一位坚强而且充满活力的女性，她的表演震撼人心。

sentences.en: The animal in the picture was a female elephant.
sentences.cn: 照片上的动物是头母象.

sentences.en: The female sits on the eggs until they hatch.
sentences.cn: 雌鸟伏在蛋上直到其孵化。

sentences.en: The male bird is barely distinguishable from the female.
sentences.cn: 雄鸟和雌鸟几乎无法辨别.

sentences.en: The male of the species is almost indistinguishable from the female.
sentences.cn: 这个物种的雄性和雌性几乎无法分辨。

sentences.en: Two of the candidates must be female.
sentences.cn: 候选人中必须有两名是女性。

sentences.en: Valentino was virtually deified by legions of female fans.
sentences.cn: 瓦伦蒂诺几乎被众多的女性崇拜者奉若神明。

words.tran_cn: 使……女性化；具有女性风度

trans.tran_en: an animal that belongs to the sex that can have babies or produce eggs
an animal that belongs to the sex that can have babies or produce eggs
